title: Apple’s App Tracking Transparency crackdown estimated to cost Facebook another $13 billion in 2022
content:
Almost a year ago, Apple released iOS 14.5. Alongside the ability to unlock the iPhone with an Apple Watch while wearing a mask and new emojis, the company also brought its controversial App Tracking Transparency feature to life. Twelve months after, a new report indicates how ATT could impact revenue from Facebook, Twitter, Snap, and YouTube in 2022.

more…

The post Apple’s App Tracking Transparency crackdown estimated to cost Facebook another $13 billion in 2022 appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A year after Apple released App Tracking Transparency feature, a report indicates how it could impact revenue from Facebook, and others.
